name: Team work makes the dream work!
name_original: Team work makes the dream work!
description:
Team work makes the dream work!

Roguelite deck-builder, made for github gameoff 2022.

Gameplay

This game is a roguelite deckbuilder; think Slay the Spire, Night of the Full Moon, Indies Lies, ... Every round, you choose which room of the dungeon you want to explore, and beat the monsters using the cards you draw.

Map

This level is a tavern, where you can ask a hero to join your team.

 
This level is a monster. Beat them to advance!

Heroes

Each hero comes with a different power. The number on the hero's portrait is a countdown (in number of turns) until the power becomes available. Click on the portrait to activate their power.
